question:
Consider the following statements about the Dhola-Sadiya Bridge:
  1. It is also known as Bhupen Hazarika Setu
  2. It connects Assam to Arunachal Pradesh
  3. It is built on the Lohit River
Which of the above are correct?
explanation: The Dhola-Sadiya Bridge is built on the River Lohit. It is the three lane, 9.15 Kilometre Bridge which connects Dhola in Assam to Sadiya in Arunachal Pradesh. It is also known as Bhupen Hazarika Setu. The Bridge reduces the distance from Rupai on NH-37 in Assam to Meka/Roing on NH-52 in Arunachal Pradesh by 165km.
